titleStmt.title: The Bishop of Worcester's answer to Mr. Locke's letter, concerning some passages relating to his Essay of humane understanding, mention'd in the late Discourse in vindication of the Trinity with a postscript in answer to some reflections made on that treatise in a late Socinian pamphlet.
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Henry Mortlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
